name: Deathly Descent
description:
A fast-paced 2D platformer with heavy emphasis on quick-thinking, survival, and exploration!

Put your skills to the test and survive a hostile underground environment. Avoid deadly traps, contend with dangerous flora, and open blocked passages to reach the core chamber of the ancient ruin, uncover the secrets behind those who built it, and retrieve their artifact contained within.

Installation instructions are included in the download. The game also includes an interactive tutorial explaining the basic gameplay controls and mechanics.
